categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tephan was a male Human Jedi Knight who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. He was stationed on Coruscant, where he sold weapons and armor to other Knights from the Jedi base in the Senate Commercial District.
Tephan appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Jedi Knight PvP vendor on Coruscant.
